column1: The '''Goatleaf Family''' were a family of the [[Men]] of [[Bree]].<ref>{{FR|I9}}</ref> As was typical among the Men of that region
column2: the name comes from a plant.

column1: [[Harry Goatleaf]] at one time watched the [[West-gate of Bree]]
column2: but threw in his lot with [[Bill Ferny]] and [[Saruman]]'s thugs during the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{RK|VI7}}</ref>

column1: It is linked to [[Wikipedia:honeysuckle|honeysuckle]] or [[Wikipedia:woodbine|woodbine]]. Its French name
column3: and would therefore presumably have been familiar to [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]].<ref>{{HM|N}}
